18 #include "AScalar.h"

20 struct AComplex
21 {
22  std::complex<float> vr;
23 
24  _AI AComplex() {}
25  _AI AComplex(const AComplex& a) : vr(a.vr) {}
26  _AI AComplex(const std::complex<float>& a) : vr(a) {}
27  _AI AComplex(const AScalar& r) : vr(r.fr, 0) {}
28  _AI AComplex(const AScalar& r, const AScalar& i) : vr(r.fr, i.fr) {}
29  _AI AComplex(float r, float i) : vr(r, i) {}
30 
31  _AI static AComplex Zero() {return std::complex<float>(0, 0);}
32  _AI static AComplex One() {return std::complex<float>(1, 0);}
33  _AI static AComplex I() {return std::complex<float>(0, 1);}
34 
35  _AI bool operator== (const AComplex& x) const {return vr == x.vr;}
36  _AI bool operator!= (const AComplex& x) const {return vr != x.vr;}
37 
38  _AI AComplex operator+ (const AComplex& x) const {return vr + x.vr;}
39  _AI AComplex operator- (const AComplex& x) const {return vr - x.vr;}
40  _AI AComplex operator- () const {return -vr;}
41  _AI AComplex operator* (const AComplex& x) const {return vr * x.vr;}
42  _AI AComplex operator* (const AScalar& x) const {return vr * x.fr;}
43  _AI AComplex operator/ (const AComplex& x) const {return vr / x.vr;}
44 
45  _AI AComplex& operator+= (const AComplex& x) {return (*this = *this + x);}
46  _AI AComplex& operator-= (const AComplex& x) {return (*this = *this - x);}
47  _AI AComplex& operator*= (const AComplex& x) {return (*this = *this * x);}
48  _AI AComplex& operator*= (const AScalar& x) {return (*this = *this * x);}
49  _AI AComplex& operator/= (const AComplex& x) {return (*this = *this / x);}
50 
51  _AI AComplex mul_add(const AComplex& x, const AComplex& y) const {
52  return vr + x.vr * y.vr;
53  }
54  _AI AComplex mul_sub(const AComplex& x, const AComplex& y) const {
55  return vr - x.vr * y.vr;
56  }
57  _AI AComplex& mul_acc(const AComplex& x, const AComplex& y) {
58  vr += x.vr * y.vr;
59  return *this;
60  }
61 
62  _AI AScalar r() const {return vr.real();}
63  _AI AScalar i() const {return vr.imag();}
64 
65  _AI AComplex& set_r(const AScalar& a) {
66  vr = std::complex<float>(a.fr, vr.imag());
67  return *this;
68  }
69  _AI AComplex& set_i(const AScalar& a) {
70  vr = std::complex<float>(vr.real(), a.fr);
71  return *this;
72  }
73 
74  _AI AComplex conj() const {return std::conj(vr);}
75  _AI AComplex mul_conj(const AComplex& y) const {return vr * std::conj(y.vr);}
76  _AI AComplex mul_conj_add(const AComplex& x, const AComplex& y) const {
77  return vr + x.vr * std::conj(y.vr);
78  }
79  _AI AComplex mul_conj_sub(const AComplex& x, const AComplex& y) const {
80  return vr - x.vr * std::conj(y.vr);
81  }
82  _AI AComplex& mul_conj_acc(const AComplex& x, const AComplex& y) {
83  vr += x.vr * std::conj(y.vr);
84  return *this;
85  }
86 
87  _AI AScalar dot(const AComplex& y) const {return mul_conj(y).r();}
88 
89  _AI AScalar norm_sq() const {return r()*r() + i()*i();}
90  _AI AScalar norm() const {return std::abs(vr);}
91  _AI AComplex inverse() const {return conj() * norm_sq().inverse();}
92 
93  _AI AComplex& normalize() {return (*this = *this * norm_sq().f_invsqrt());}
94 };
95 
96 _AI AComplex AScalar::operator* (const struct AComplex& x) const {
97  return x.vr * fr;
98 }

104 struct PComplex
105 {
106  AComplex* ptr;
107 
108  _AI PComplex(void* p) : ptr((AComplex*) p) {}
109 
110  _AI operator AComplex*() const {return ptr;}
111  _AI AComplex* operator->() const {return ptr;}
112  _AI AComplex& operator[] (int i) const {return ptr[i];}
113 
114  _AI PComplex operator+ (int index) const {return PComplex(ptr + index);}
115  _AI PComplex operator- (int index) const {return PComplex(ptr - index);}
116 
117  _AI PComplex& operator+= (int index) {ptr += index; return *this;}
118  _AI PComplex& operator-= (int index) {ptr -= index; return *this;}
119 
120  _AI PComplex& operator++ () {++ptr; return *this;}
121  _AI PComplex& operator-- () {--ptr; return *this;}
122  _AI PComplex operator++ (int) {PComplex p(*this); ++ptr; return p;}
123  _AI PComplex operator-- (int) {PComplex p(*this); --ptr; return p;}
124 };
